name: Limit Name
verbTooltip: By default, all verbs will be limited unless a specific verb is selected for the limit type.

name.minLength: Limit name must be at least 2 characters
name.pattern: Limit name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and underscores

limitRate.min: Limit rate must be greater than 0
limitRate.pattern: Limit rate must be a valid positive integer

role.required: Role selection is required when limit type requires it

service.required: Service selection is required when limit type requires it

endpoint.required: Endpoint selection is required when limit type requires it

user.required: User selection is required when limit type requires it

tooltips.nameTooltip: Unique identifier for this rate limit configuration
tooltips.descriptionTooltip: Optional description to help identify the purpose of this limit
tooltips.limitTypeTooltip: Determines the scope and enforcement level of the rate limit
tooltips.limitRateTooltip: Maximum number of requests allowed within the specified period
tooltips.limitPeriodTooltip: Time window for the rate limit enforcement
tooltips.roleTooltip: Apply limit to users with this specific role
tooltips.serviceTooltip: Apply limit to requests targeting this service
tooltips.endpointTooltip: Apply limit to requests targeting this specific endpoint
tooltips.userTooltip: Apply limit to this specific user account
tooltips.verbTooltip: Apply limit to specific HTTP methods (GET, POST, etc.)
tooltips.activeTooltip: Toggle to enable or disable this rate limit

error.loadFailed: Failed to load rate limit data
error.duplicateName: A rate limit with this name already exists

warning.highRateLimit: This rate limit allows a very high number of requests
warning.noVerbSelected: No specific HTTP verb selected - limit applies to all verbs
warning.overlappingLimit: This limit may overlap with existing rate limits
warning.deletePermanent: Deleting this rate limit cannot be undone

info.rateLimitScope: This rate limit will apply to {{scope}} with {{rate}} requests per {{period}}

empty.title: No Rate Limits Configured
empty.description: Create your first rate limit to control API usage

selectType.title: Choose Rate Limit Type
selectType.description: Select the type of rate limit you want to create

typeDescriptions.instance: Apply limit to the entire DreamFactory instance
typeDescriptions.user: Apply limit to a specific user account
typeDescriptions.eachUser: Apply limit to each individual user
typeDescriptions.service: Apply limit to a specific service
typeDescriptions.role: Apply limit to users with a specific role
typeDescriptions.serviceByUser: Apply per-user limit on a specific service
typeDescriptions.serviceByEachUser: Apply individual user limits on a specific service
typeDescriptions.endpoint: Apply limit to a specific API endpoint
typeDescriptions.endpointByUser: Apply per-user limit on a specific endpoint
typeDescriptions.endpointByEachUser: Apply individual user limits on a specific endpoint

configure.title: Configure Rate Limit
configure.description: Set the rate limit parameters and scope

review.title: Review Configuration
review.description: Verify your rate limit configuration before saving

limitTypes.title: Understanding Rate Limit Types
limitTypes.content: Rate limit types determine how and where the limits are applied in your API infrastructure.

periods.title: Time Periods
periods.content: Choose the time window for rate limit enforcement based on your API usage patterns.

bestPractices.title: Rate Limiting Best Practices
items: Start with conservative limits and adjust based on usage patterns
Use different limits for different user roles or service tiers
Monitor rate limit hits to identify potential issues
Consider burst allowances for legitimate high-volume usage
